name: Walter Clark Legal Group
tag_list: personal-injury-lawyer, personal-injury, accident-attorney, auto-accidents, wrongful-death, legal-expenses, truck-accidents, professional-paralegal-services, construction-accidents, motorcycle-accidents
overview: Walter Clark Legal Group in Rancho Mirage, CA is a private company categorized under Legal Services. When disaster strikes, disrupting your life and complicating things for you and your family, you discover how difficult it can be to resolve a California personal injury or wrongful death claim in the complex legal world. This is where the California injury lawyers at Walter Clark come in. You are probably upset that the insurance companies involved have not offered a fair settlement, forcing you to exhaust energy on the insurance claims process while you deal with the medical, emotional, and financial difficulties that follow a serious accident. We understand what you’re going through and we want to help.
